entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late this afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 30 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 10 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow and local blowing snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to minus 10 by morning. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 30 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
